task.name: hifv_circfeedpolcal
task.shortdescription: Perform polarization calibration for VLA circular feeds.
task.description:
Perform polarization calibration for VLA circular feeds.
Only validated for VLA sky survey data in S-band continuum mode with 3C138 or 3C286 as polarization angle. Requires that all polarization intents are properly set during observation.

param.name: refantignore
param.shortdescription: String list of antennas to ignore

param.name: leakage_poltype
param.shortdescription: poltype to use in first polcal execution - blank string means use default heuristics
param.description: poltype to use in first polcal execution - blank string means use default heuristics

param.name: mbdkcross
param.shortdescription: Run gaincal KCROSS grouped by baseband
param.description: Run gaincal KCROSS grouped by baseband

param.name: clipminmax
param.shortdescription: Acceptable range for leakage amplitudes, values outside will be flagged.
param.description: Acceptable range for leakage amplitudes, values outside will be flagged.

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In 'interactive' mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or display task command (True)
param.description: Run the commands (True) or generate the commands to be run but do not execute (False). This is a pipeline task execution mode.

param.name: acceptresults
param.shortdescription: Add the results into the pipeline context
param.description: Add the results of the task to the pipeline context (True) or reject them (False). This is a pipeline task execution mode.
